<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ragdya's Revelry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4008) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 56</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
An adjacent creature you can see fails an attack roll against you.

</column>

---

You dart away from your foe's attack with a casual laugh, using the opening to cause mischief. You attempt to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) an item from the triggering creature, ignoring the usual restriction that the creature can't be in combat.
name: Ragdya's Revelry
